author: parithosh
content:
Changes have been merged now: https://github.com/ethpandaops/ethereum-package/pull/880 (or will be once CI runs through). 

You can now use it like this:
```
network_params:
  deneb_fork_epoch: 0
  electra_fork_epoch: 1
  fulu_fork_epoch: 2
  eip7732_fork_epoch: 3
  eip7805_fork_epoch: 4
```

Note: `electra_fork_epoch` must be > 0, we can't do electra genesis right now. I'll work on adding support to that once pectra is a bit further along. However you can use `minimal` or reduce `seconds_per_slot` if you want faster iteration times.

author: terencechain
content:
I've fixed a few more bugs on prysm's `focil` branch. It know uses formal eip7805 fork epoch. Kurtosis example:
```
network_params:
  electra_fork_epoch: 1
  fulu_fork_epoch: 2
  eip7805_fork_epoch: 3
```

It also properly updates block with inclusion list:
`[cl-2-prysm-geth] time="2025-01-27 22:31:26" level=info msg="Updated block with inclusion list" headRoot=4eb106947dd7386a2c1631dd007c6dda430fa46d7789f68bf963e878bbfff6cf prefix=blockchain slot=103 txs=36`

And no more annoying `Received nil message on pubsub` error
